sourcesContent: import{styled as t}from"../theme/stitches.config";import a from"./avatar.styles";export const StyledAvatarGroupCount=t("span",{fontSize:"$xs",display:"inline-flex",alignItems:"center",marginLeft:"$3",color:"$text"});export const StyledAvatarGroup=t("div",{dflex:"center",height:"auto",width:"max-content","@motion":{transition:"none"},[`& ${a}`]:{marginLeft:"-$space$5",transition:"$default",".only-text-avatar":{boxShadow:"$xs"}},".only-text-avatar":{boxShadow:"$xs"},variants:{animated:{true:{[`& ${a}:hover`]:{transform:"translate(-$space$5)"}}}},defaultVariants:{animated:!0}});export default StyledAvatarGroup;
